title: Michael Gove – 2012 Speech at Brighton College
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by the Secretary of State for Education, Michael Gove, at Brighton College on 10th May 2012.

You’re 20 times more likely to go on and play for England if you go to private school rather than state school.
